headline: Deck the Halls Safely this Holiday Season
summary: With the holiday season fast approaching, FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) is reminding customers to reduce electrical hazards and potential fire risks at home by following important safety tips when installing holiday lights and decorations.
